alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln, east central Jefferson, northeastern Franklin and southwestern Copiah Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caseyville, or 11 miles northwest of Brookhaven, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Caseyville around 640 PM CDT. Allen and Pleasant Hill around 700 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
